io.dropwizard.configuration

Class ConfigurationFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dropwizard.configuration.ConfigurationFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the configuration objects to produce

    public class ConfigurationFactory<T>
extends Object
    A factory class for loading YAML configuration files, binding them to configuration objects, and and validating their constraints. Allows for overriding configuration parameters from system properties.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new configuration factory for the given class.

        Parameters:
        klass - the configuration class
        validator - the validator to use
        objectMapper - the Jackson ObjectMapper to use
        propertyPrefix - the system property name prefix used by overrides

      • build

        public T build(ConfigurationSourceProvider provider,
               String path)
        throws IOException,
               ConfigurationException
        Loads, parses, binds, and validates a configuration object.
        Parameters:
        provider - the provider to to use for reading configuration files
        path - the path of the configuration file
        Returns:
        a validated configuration object
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error reading the file
        ConfigurationException - if there is an error parsing or validating the file
